data.title: Banishers: Ghosts of New Eden
data.text:
Discover to Banishers: Ghosts of New Eden - an all-new title crafted by the renowned studio DON'T NOD, known for their acclaimed works Life is Strange and Vampyr. Immerse in an unforgettable action RPG that takes you on an exhilarating journey between life, death, love and sacrifices.

You assume the roles of a couple of Banishers, experienced spirit hunters, entrusted with the daunting task of lifting a malevolent and ominous curse. Become a beacon of hope in a world consumed by darkness and find a way to reunite with the love of your life.

You assume the roles of a couple of Banishers, experienced spirit hunters, entrusted with the daunting task of lifting a malevolent and ominous curse. Become a beacon of hope in a world consumed by darkness and find a way to reunite with the love of your life.

In New Eden, 1695, communities of settlers are plagued by a haunting curse. As Banishers, step into their lives, investigate the source of evil, unravel chilling mysteries, explore diverse landscapes, and interact with unforgettable characters whose fate lies in your hands.

Your choices carry substantial consequences that must be taken seriously. Tormented spirits and afflicted residents share common stories involving love, betrayal, suffering, and hidden depths that bind them together. Every decision matter, at the end of your journey past choices may come back to haunt you and your beloved. How far will you go to save the love of your life?

Play as both characters, combining Red's weaponry with Antea's supernatural abilities into a unique combat system where you fight spectral apparitions with fluid attacks. A mix of combat styles are available thanks to Red’s rifle, sword, and firebane alongside Antea’s ethereal attacks.
